Articles.Content:
If you do not know I was a member of KME which is now disbanded. Now I dont know what company I would like to join.

Company would need at least BD Armory allowed. Although more mods  would be better.

Having a organized collection of crafts and a neat main post was the charm of KME as well as neatly done craft posts.

 

I might sound picky but I just miss KME, and trust me I'm not very picky.
Companies aren't allowed anymore sadly. Try making a showcase for just your own craft.

Yes, the "companies" were causing a lot of arguments, feuds, breaking of forum rules, and moderator warns, and so that sort of thing is no longer allowed on the forum. You may have your own personal company name and logo, but no "employees," hiring, firing, etc.
